member.name: DWRITE_SCRIPT_ANALYSIS
member.summary: Stores the association of text and its writing system script, as well as some display attributes.

member.name: DWRITE_SCRIPT_ANALYSIS.script
member.summary: The zero-based index representation of writing system script.

member.name: DWRITE_SCRIPT_ANALYSIS.shapes
member.summary: A value that indicates additional shaping requirement of text.
